name: Quest Life RPG (Early-Build) + Platoonz
description:
THE GAME IS UNFINISHED!

A Classic Adventure Awaits!

Explore the Auroa Islands and discover secrets being hidden from everyone! There's people in need of help, maybe they'll give you a clue on whats going on. 

Features in the Game:

  • Explore many houses, dungeons, guard towers, towns and villages.
  • Random encounters to fight your way through.
  • Many creatures to fight including; Slime, Bats, Spiders & more (to be included).
  • Find treasure chests filled with gold, weapons, items & armor.
  • Hire several party members to help you on your adventure.
  • Several quest to complete in game (More will be included).
  • Featuring a classic battle system and interface!

Make sure you follow through the story by talking to others, finding hidden areas and more!

NOTE: This is a early build, meaning, there's still things to be added into game, errors to be fixed and updates to come. I hope you truly understand this before you leave a negative review on the game. I decided to release the game early so for those who downloaded the game can give me feedback on the game.  There's also a bigger part of the map but it's currently being made. The map is finished but has to be unlocked. Follow through the story! It's not finished but I will update! Last thing I want to put out is that this is my very first game I personally made by myself. I hope everyone who reads this understands!

Also, I want to point out for those who can't run the game, let me know, I'll try my best to fix the issue for you!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move Player / Selection
  • Space / Enter Button - Action
  • ESC - Menu / Back
  • Shift - Sprint

Things to be fixed so far:

  • Replace Game Over after losing a battle (Must save game when playing!) Happens only on first map area!
  • Some characters dialog's
  • Adjustments into some enemies.

Let me know other things that needs to be fixed!

This game was made using RPG Maker VX Ace, in case you wonder what engine I used!

I'm including another brand new game I quickly made; Platoonz for free! It's not ready yet but if you want to try it now, it's together with your purchase of Quest Life RPG!

Platoonz was made using the Platfinity Engine, credit goes to Ian!
